title: Project Planning and Requirements Gathering
description: Define project scope, goals, and requirements. Conduct stakeholder interviews and gather input from relevant teams (HR, management, etc.) to understand the organization's career paths and growth opportunities.

title: Design System Architecture for CareerPathExplorer
description: Design the overall system architecture, including data models, user interfaces, and integration with existing systems (e.g., HR databases, learning management systems, skills databases). Consider scalability, maintainability, and performance optimizations. Ensure proper error handling, security measures (e.g., authentication, authorization, data encryption), accessibility standards, and compliance with organization's design guidelines are in place. Also, consider the long-term maintenance and evolution of the system, and provide detailed documentation for each component and integration points. Once completed, review the design with relevant stakeholders and iterate as necessary. After approval, commence task decomposition.

title: Database Design and Implementation
description: Design and implement the database schema to store career path data, job roles, skills, and other relevant information.

title: Backend Development
description: Develop the backend services and APIs for managing career path data, user authentication, and integration with other systems.

title: Frontend Development
description: Design and develop the user interface for exploring career paths, visualizing growth opportunities, and accessing relevant resources.

title: Security and Access Control - REVISED
description: Implement robust security measures, including user authentication, authorization, and data encryption. Implement Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) for different user levels, ensure secure storage of sensitive career and employee information, implement OAuth or similar for third-party integrations. Also, consider implementing two-factor authentication (2FA) to further enhance security.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop comprehensive test plans and execute thorough testing, including unit tests, integration tests, and user acceptance testing, to ensure the application's functionality, usability, and performance.

title: Deployment and DevOps
description: Set up the deployment pipeline, configure the production environment, and implement monitoring and logging mechanisms for the application.

title: Documentation and User Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the application, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials for employees and administrators.
